ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# import global configuration data from ApplicationDirector . $global_conf
ANT_DOWNLOAD_URL="$ant_download_url" INSTALL_DIR="$install_dir"
#############ANT DOWNLOAD########################## cd /usr wget --output-document=ant.tar.gz $ANT_DOWNLOAD_URL tar -xvf ant.tar.gz
PATH=$PATH:/usr/apache-ant-1.8.4/bin
############SETTING JAVA HOME####################### if [ -f /usr/java/jre-vmware/bin/java ]; then export JAVA_HOME=/usr/java/jre-vmware else export JAVA_HOME=/usr fi ############STARTING WSO2 SERVER######################## cd $INSTALL_DIR/wso2esb-4.0.3/bin ./wso2server.sh --start ant

bindable-props.name: ClusterSize
bindable-props.description: Number of nodes in the cluster

task.content:
#!/bin/bash set -e
basearch=`uname -p` if [ $basearch == "i686" ] ; then basearch=i386 fi
DIST=`cat /etc/redhat-release |sed s/\ release.*//` if [ "$DIST" = "CentOS" ] ; then releasever=5.8
else releasever=6.3 #releasever=6.2 fi
repository_url=http://fr2.rpmfind.net/linux/centos/$releasever/os/$basearch/ #repository_url=http://mirrors.login.com/centos/$releasever/os/$basearch/ echo $repository_url
if [ x$remove_all_repos = 'xtrue' ]; then rm -rf /etc/yum.repos.d/* fi
cat > "/etc/yum.repos.d/$repository_name.repo" << YUMREPOCONFIG [$repository_name] name=$repository_name baseurl=$repository_url enabled=1 gpgcheck=0 YUMREPOCONFIG

prop-auto-bind-type.name: None
prop-auto-bind-type.description: Property will not participate in auto-binding.

props.description: Should all other repositories be removed? (true or false)

prop-auto-bind-type.description: Property will not participate in auto-binding.

ns9:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash set -e
basearch=`uname -p` if [ $basearch == "i686" ] ; then basearch=i386 fi
DIST=`cat /etc/redhat-release |sed s/\ release.*//` if [ "$DIST" = "CentOS" ] ; then releasever=5.8
else releasever=6.3 #releasever=6.2 fi
repository_url=http://fr2.rpmfind.net/linux/centos/$releasever/os/$basearch/ #repository_url=http://mirrors.login.com/centos/$releasever/os/$basearch/ echo $repository_url
if [ x$remove_all_repos = 'xtrue' ]; then rm -rf /etc/yum.repos.d/* fi
cat > "/etc/yum.repos.d/$repository_name.repo" << YUMREPOCONFIG [$repository_name] name=$repository_name baseurl=$repository_url enabled=1 gpgcheck=0 YUMREPOCONFIG

task.content:
#!/bin/bash
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e export http_proxy=http://proxy.vmware.com:3128
ANT_DOWNLOAD_URL="$ant_download_url" INSTALL_DIR="$install_dir"
#############ANT DOWNLOAD########################## cd /usr wget --output-document=ant.tar.gz $ANT_DOWNLOAD_URL tar -xvf ant.tar.gz
PATH=$PATH:/usr/apache-ant-1.8.4/bin
############SETTING JAVA HOME####################### if [ -f /usr/java/jre-vmware/bin/java ]; then export JAVA_HOME=/usr/java/jre-vmware else export JAVA_HOME=/usr fi ############STARTING WSO2 SERVER######################## cd $INSTALL_DIR/wso2esb-4.0.3/bin ./wso2server.sh --start ant
